languages.text: "Хорошо мне послужишь, и я не стану натравливать на тебя кое-кого... Один любитель арены обзавелся зверем-нюхачом, яростным и зубастым. Сейчас он пробует свою новую игрушку на отбросах у свалки трупов, но скоро переключится на добычу посерьезнее — и ты не хочешь ею стать".
languages.translation_comment:
если играет этюд FindSolomorne
выдаем адденум на собаку и на Соломона

traits.locale_text: [draft] "И запомни, человечек... Это место не прощает. Ничего, никого. Железная псина у Ямы до сих пор рыщет в поисках своего хозяина. Я все жду продолжения этой душещипательной истории — когда в одном из кусков мяса он узнает его". {n}Оскал Злобы обнажает бритвенно-острые зубы.{/n}

languages.translation_comment:
если играет этюд FindSolomorne
выдаем адденум на собаку и на Соломона

languages.text: "Serve me well, and I will not set a certain someone on you... There is an arena enthusiast who has acquired a scent beast, ferocious and toothy. Right now, he is trying out his new toy on the refuse near the corpse dump, but soon, he will seek out bigger prey, and you do not want to be it."
languages.original_text: "Хорошо мне послужишь, и я не стану натравливать на тебя кое-кого... Один любитель арены обзавелся зверем-нюхачом, яростным и зубастым. Сейчас он пробует свою новую игрушку на отбросах у свалки трупов, но скоро переключится на добычу посерьезнее — и ты не хочешь ею стать".

traits.locale_text: "Serve me well, and I will not sic on you a certain someone... There is an arena lover who has acquired a sniffing beast, ferocious and toothy. Right now he is trying out his new toy on the refuse near the offal heap, but soon he will seek out bigger prey, and you do not want to be it."

"Serve me well, and I will not sic on you a certain someone... There is an arena lover who has acquired a sniffing beast, ferocious and toothy. Right now he is trying out his new toy on the refuse near the offal heap, but soon he will seek out bigger prey, and you do not want to be it."

"Serve me well, and I will not set a certain someone on you... There is an arena enthusiast who has acquired a scent beast, ferocious and toothy. Right now, he is trying out his new toy on the refuse near the corpse dump, but soon, he will seek out bigger prey, and you do not want to be it."

"Serve me well, and I will not set a certain someone on you... There is an arena enthusiast who has acquired a scent beast, ferocious and toothy. Right now, he is trying out his new toy on the refuse near the corpse dump, but soon, he will seek out bigger prey, and you do not want to be it."

languages.text: "Dient mir gut, und ich setze nicht einen gewissen Jemand auf Euch an ... Es gibt da einen Arena-Enthusiasten, der sich ein wildes Spürtier mit spitzen Zähnen angeschafft hat. Im Moment testet er sein neues Spielzeug an den Abfällen unweit des Leichenhaufens, aber bald wird er sich größere Beute suchen, und das wollt Ihr nicht sein."
languages.original_text: "Serve me well, and I will not set a certain someone on you... There is an arena enthusiast who has acquired a scent beast, ferocious and toothy. Right now, he is trying out his new toy on the refuse near the corpse dump, but soon, he will seek out bigger prey, and you do not want to be it."

traits.locale_text: "Dient mir gut, und ich setze nicht einen gewissen Jemand auf Euch an ... Es gibt da einen Arena-Enthusiasten, der sich ein wildes Spürtier mit spitzen Zähnen angeschafft hat. Im Moment testet er sein neues Spielzeug an den Abfällen unweit des Leichenhaufens, aber bald wird er sich größere Beute suchen, und das wollt Ihr nicht sein."

languages.text: « Si vous me servez convenablement, je m'abstiendrai d'envoyer une certaine personne à vos trousses... Je connais un adepte de l'arène qui s'est procuré un limier féroce aux dents acérées. En ce moment, il essaie son nouveau jouet sur les vermines près de la décharge funéraire, mais bientôt, il cherchera de meilleures proies. Il serait regrettable qu'il jette son dévolu sur vous. »
languages.original_text: "Serve me well, and I will not set a certain someone on you... There is an arena enthusiast who has acquired a scent beast, ferocious and toothy. Right now, he is trying out his new toy on the refuse near the corpse dump, but soon, he will seek out bigger prey, and you do not want to be it."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous me servez convenablement, je m'abstiendrai d'envoyer une certaine personne à vos trousses... Je connais un adepte de l'arène qui s'est procuré un limier féroce aux dents acérées. En ce moment, il essaie son nouveau jouet sur les vermines près de la décharge funéraire, mais bientôt, il cherchera de meilleures proies. Il serait regrettable qu'il jette son dévolu sur vous. »

languages.text: “只要好好服侍我，我就不会派人来收拾你……有个对竞技场很感兴趣的家伙，最近弄到一头嗅觉灵敏的畜生。那畜生牙很尖，性子也很凶。这个人在尸坑附近的垃圾堆游荡，打算试试他的新玩具。用不了多久，他大概就会寻找更大的猎物，你肯定不想沦为他的猎物。”
languages.original_text: "Serve me well, and I will not set a certain someone on you... There is an arena enthusiast who has acquired a scent beast, ferocious and toothy. Right now, he is trying out his new toy on the refuse near the corpse dump, but soon, he will seek out bigger prey, and you do not want to be it."

traits.locale_text: “只要好好服侍我，我就不会派人来收拾你……有个对竞技场很感兴趣的家伙，最近弄到一头嗅觉灵敏的畜生。那畜生牙很尖，性子也很凶。这个人在尸坑附近的垃圾堆游荡，打算试试他的新玩具。用不了多久，他大概就会寻找更大的猎物，你肯定不想沦为他的猎物。”

languages.text: «Sírveme bien y no azuzaré a cierta persona contra ti... Un entusiasta de la arena ha obtenido una bestia de rastreo, feroz y colmilluda. Ahora mismo está probando su nuevo juguete en los desechos cerca del vertedero de cadáveres, pero pronto buscará presas más grandes, y no te interesa estar en su punto de mira».
languages.original_text: "Serve me well, and I will not set a certain someone on you... There is an arena enthusiast who has acquired a scent beast, ferocious and toothy. Right now, he is trying out his new toy on the refuse near the corpse dump, but soon, he will seek out bigger prey, and you do not want to be it."

traits.locale_text: «Sírveme bien y no azuzaré a cierta persona contra ti... Un entusiasta de la arena ha obtenido una bestia de rastreo, feroz y colmilluda. Ahora mismo está probando su nuevo juguete en los desechos cerca del vertedero de cadáveres, pero pronto buscará presas más grandes, y no te interesa estar en su punto de mira».

languages.text: 「俺によく仕えれば、ある『お方』を貴様にけしかけることはしないでおいてやろう…闘技場の熱狂的な愛好家が、獰猛で牙をむく嗅覚獣を手に入れたんだ。今は死体捨て場の近くのゴミの中で新しいおもちゃを試してるが、すぐにもっと大きな獲物を探しに来る。貴様がそれにならんことを祈るんだな」
languages.original_text: "Serve me well, and I will not set a certain someone on you... There is an arena enthusiast who has acquired a scent beast, ferocious and toothy. Right now, he is trying out his new toy on the refuse near the corpse dump, but soon, he will seek out bigger prey, and you do not want to be it."

traits.locale_text: 「俺によく仕えれば、ある『お方』を貴様にけしかけることはしないでおいてやろう…闘技場の熱狂的な愛好家が、獰猛で牙をむく嗅覚獣を手に入れたんだ。今は死体捨て場の近くのゴミの中で新しいおもちゃを試してるが、すぐにもっと大きな獲物を探しに来る。貴様がそれにならんことを祈るんだな」

languages.text: "Bana iyi hizmet etmezsen üzerine salacağım biri var... Bu arena meraklısının hayvanı iyi koku alır, vahşi ve dişlidir. Şu anda ceset yığınının orada yeni oyuncağıyla oynuyor. Yakında daha büyük avların peşine düşecek. Onlardan olmak istemezsin."
languages.original_text: "Serve me well, and I will not set a certain someone on you... There is an arena enthusiast who has acquired a scent beast, ferocious and toothy. Right now, he is trying out his new toy on the refuse near the corpse dump, but soon, he will seek out bigger prey, and you do not want to be it."

traits.locale_text: "Bana iyi hizmet etmezsen üzerine salacağım biri var... Bu arena meraklısının hayvanı iyi koku alır, vahşi ve dişlidir. Şu anda ceset yığınının orada yeni oyuncağıyla oynuyor. Yakında daha büyük avların peşine düşecek. Onlardan olmak istemezsin."
